name: queryLazy
description: Pass the records without creating a query as result.

params.name: params
params.description: Array or Struct of parameter values. When passing an array use ? as place holders. When passing a struct use :keyName where keyName is the name of the key in the structure corresponding to the parameter. The struct or array can be a struct with keys such as the following.

params.name: options
params.description: Struct containing query options, all cfquery tag attributes are supported except the name attribute.
